name: odbc_tableprivileges
purpose: Lists tables and the privileges associated with each table

return.description:
An ODBC result identifier or FALSE on failure.The result set has the following columns:
   
    TABLE_QUALIFIER
    TABLE_OWNER
    TABLE_NAME
    GRANTOR
    GRANTEE
    PRIVILEGE
    IS_GRANTABLEThe result set is ordered by TABLE_QUALIFIER, TABLE_OWNER and
   TABLE_NAME.
